= Supported Document Formats =

List of supported document formats for this !AddOn is an intersection between list of formats supported by OpenOffice.org and Google Docs.

Documents:
  * !OpenDocument Text (.odt)
  * !StarOffice (.sxw)
  * Microsoft Word (.doc, but not MS XML)
  * Rich Text (.rtf)

Spreadsheets:
  * !OpenDocument Spreadsheet (.ods)
  * Microsoft Excel (.xls)
  * Comma Separated Value (.csv)
